b2cf8966-52ac-41e2-b56f-a1b0d30a6f66.description: Verint’s Platform Extension Program leverages the openness of the Verint Cloud Platform, Verint developer tools, and the Verint Marketplace to enable development and promote integrations across the Verint portfolio. The program makes it easy for partners to deliver innovative solutions to accelerate growth and differentiate in the market. Participation in the program includes access to a wide array of tools and resources.
b2cf8966-52ac-41e2-b56f-a1b0d30a6f66.name: Platform Extension Program

badge_template_activities.title: Badge holder is registered for the Verint Platform Extension Program. Badge holder has interviewed with the Verint program leader and found to have qualifications as a partner aligned with developing against or integrating to Verint solutions. Finally, badge holder has cleared trade compliance requirements to participate in the program.

d35eb822-e542-4152-aa11-60462738703f.description: Verint® Financial Compliance is an enterprise, multivendor-compatible solution designed to help financial organizations retain, retrieve, and manage recorded voice and electronic communications data from the trading floor, branch, and back office. After completing the online curriculum the partner will have learned the overall function and value and typical use cases for Verint Financial Compliance.
d35eb822-e542-4152-aa11-60462738703f.name: Verint Financial Compliance Fundamentals - Level 1

badge_template_activities.title: Badge holder has completed the foundational curriculum for introducing partner professionals to Verint Financial Compliance Fundamentals Level 1 and passed an assessment with at least 80% success. The earner of this badge has attained the Verint Financial Capture Level 1 Accreditation. As a Level 1 accredited engineer, they may install and configure the Verint Financial Compliance solution as well as perform various administration tasks.

3f1ce6b8-5e36-40df-899d-1147f9c99b9d.description: Verint® Financial Compliance is an enterprise, multivendor-compatible solution designed to help financial organizations retain, retrieve, and manage recorded voice and electronic communications data from the trading floor, branch, and back office. After completing the online curriculum the partner will have learned the overall function and value and typical use cases for Verint Financial Compliance with Cisco UC solutions.
3f1ce6b8-5e36-40df-899d-1147f9c99b9d.name: Verint Financial Compliance Integrations - Level 2: CISCO

badge_template_activities.title: The earner of this badge has attained the Verint Financial Capture Level 2 Cisco Accreditation. The badge holder has completed the advanced curriculum for partner professionals and passed an assessment with at least 80% success. . As a Level 2 accredited engineer, the partner Services & Support Engineers have demonstrated the necessary skills to configure the VFC solution in a Cisco environment.

37d2a401-f3c8-44c6-8f8f-cf5c37dd8967.description: Verint® Knowledge Management™ Professional is a highly scalable solution that makes it easy to deliver the right knowledge to users in the contact center and to customers through self-service. Available in the cloud, Knowledge Management Professional can give your agents the tools they need to provide exceptional service. After completing the online curriculum the partner will have learned the overall function and value and typical use cases for KM Professional.
37d2a401-f3c8-44c6-8f8f-cf5c37dd8967.name: Verint Knowledge Management Professional - Application Consultant

badge_template_activities.title: Badge holder has completed the comprehensive curriculum for partner services professionals to have a working comprehension of configuring and onboarding customers for Verint Knowledge Management Professional and passed an assessment with at least 80% success. The curriculum consists of online classes and videos that allow the partner services professional to work their own pace, pause/resume and revisit topics.

63f30328-276a-4f8b-b52b-2acba70eb189.description: Verint® Quality Management™ is part of a patent-protected portfolio of cloud solutions that enables the world’s most iconic brands to efficiently connect work, data, and experiences to build enduring customer relationships. Available in the cloud or on premises, it can give your agents the tools they need to provide exceptional service. After completing the online curriculum the partner will have learned the overall function and value and how to configure Verint Quality Management.
63f30328-276a-4f8b-b52b-2acba70eb189.name: Verint Quality Management - Sales

badge_template_activities.title: Badge holder has completed the foundational curriculum for introducing partner sales professionals to Verint Quality Management and passed an assessment with at least 80% success. The curriculum consists of online classes and videos that allow the partner sales professional to work their own pace, pause/resume and revisit topics.

de5030d1-9ddc-42df-ac98-47fad08c1075.description: Verint® Application Triggers™ is an innovative, cloud-based solution that provides contact center leadership with the assurance that their center is complying with the appropriate rules, regulations, and processes. It can trigger actions based on real-time desktop events to help ensure compliance, such as pausing and resuming recording. After completing the online curriculum the partner will have learned the overall function and value and typical use cases for Verint Application Triggers.
de5030d1-9ddc-42df-ac98-47fad08c1075.name: Verint Application Triggers - Sales

badge_template_activities.title: Badge holder has completed the foundational curriculum for introducing partner sales professionals to Verint Application Triggers and passed an assessment with at least 80% success. The curriculum consists of online classes and videos that allow the partner sales professional to work their own pace, pause/resume and revisit topics.

d59cf3a7-99b5-4814-9ac0-ba1822dcab8b.description: Verint® Interaction Quality™ measures the customers’ perception of quality through post-call and post-interaction surveys and feeds the data seamlessly into Verint’s Quality Management workflows. After completing the online curriculum the partner will have learned the overall function and value and typical use cases for Verint Interaction Quality.
d59cf3a7-99b5-4814-9ac0-ba1822dcab8b.name: Verint Interaction Quality - Sales

badge_template_activities.title: Badge holder has completed the foundational curriculum for introducing partner sales professionals to Verint Interaction Quality and passed an assessment with at least 80% success. The curriculum consists of online classes and videos that allow the partner sales professional to work their own pace, pause/resume and revisit topics.

d2fcb5ac-98f4-41e8-a470-ad7e37471f94.description: Verint® Operations Manager™ is a cloud-based productivity and analytics solution that helps back-office operations manage a dynamic and dispersed workforce. The purpose-built solution automates the capture of employee activity and work item data from the many disparate systems and multiple employees who execute work. After completing the online curriculum the partner will have learned the overall function and value and typical use cases for Verint Operations Manager.
d2fcb5ac-98f4-41e8-a470-ad7e37471f94.name: Verint Operations Manager - Sales

badge_template_activities.title: Badge holder has completed the foundational curriculum for partner sales professionals to have a working comprehension of Verint Operations Manager and passed an assessment with at least 80% success. The curriculum consists of online classes and videos that allow the partner sales professional to work their own pace, pause/resume and revisit topics.

0c1be0a9-10e1-415c-868f-e176bdce37fd.description: Verint® Real-Time Agent Assist™ is an innovative solution that analyzes calls and desktop activities in real time and can automatically identify opportunities to guide interactions toward better outcomes for your customers and organization. When certain criteria are met, employees receive automated assistance and guidance in a centralized notification center. After completing the online curriculum the partner will have learned the overall function and value and typical use cases for Verint RTAA.
0c1be0a9-10e1-415c-868f-e176bdce37fd.name: Verint Real-Time Agent Assist (RTAA) - Sales

badge_template_activities.title: Badge holder has completed the foundational curriculum for introducing partner sales professionals to Verint Real-Time Agent Assist (RTAA) and passed an assessment with at least 80% success. dda4e771-185c-4531-9ac8-f9f87f52e30d.description: Verint® Speech Analytics™ is part of a patent-protected portfolio of customer engagement solutions that help organizations enrich customer interactions, improve business processes, and optimize their workforces to enhance loyalty, increase revenue, mitigate risk, and manage operational costs. After completing the online curriculum the partner will have learned the overall function and value and typical use cases for Verint Speech Analytics.
dda4e771-185c-4531-9ac8-f9f87f52e30d.name: Verint Speech Analytics - Sales

b0f85a04-d03f-4a2a-ae0e-96b16e3df8df.description: Verint® Workforce Management™ is part of a patent-protected portfolio of cloud solutions that enables the world’s most iconic brands to efficiently connect work, data, and experiences to build enduring customer relationships. It simplifies the complex task of hiring, forecasting, and scheduling, even at scale and with complex scheduling rules. After completing the online curriculum the partner will have learned the overall function and value and typical use cases for Verint Workforce Management.

55b7fd2c-4702-47b7-ac55-449a578e6472.description: Verint Integration Challenge is an opportunity for Verint partners to showcase their creativity and development skills to integrate with the Verint platform. Partners can leverage the openness of the Verint platform and Developer Portal to access APIs and developer guides to enable integration across the Verint portfolio.
55b7fd2c-4702-47b7-ac55-449a578e6472.name: Integration Challenge

badge_template_activities.title: Winner of the 2023 Verint Integration Challenge.

d9a32260-9906-4fbf-ad08-60d4268238a4.description: Verint Marketplace is a place to publish your offerings that show how you extend Verint value with your own value proposition using Verint Cloud. Partner listings are enhanced with SEO discoverability and can include images, videos and contact information to ensure customers and vendors can ensure they get connected to you and the value you offer.
d9a32260-9906-4fbf-ad08-60d4268238a4.name: Marketplace Contributor

badge_template_activities.title: Badge holder has Successfully created and published one or more marketplace listing in the Verint Marketplace.

a41631b4-669e-45c1-8bff-37feae989d05.description: Verint® Application Visualizer™ is an innovative, cloud-based solution that gives contact center leadership and staff visibility into employee desktop application usage and behaviors. The solution provides objective data to help you manage your work-from-anywhere workforce, improve employee productivity and increase capacity. After completing the online curriculum the partner will have learned the overall function and value and typical use cases for Verint Application Visualizer.

648d84ee-78a6-4b0e-8fd5-d6042d8942d6.description: Verint Global Support is the focal point for all Customer requests related to the use and support of licensed Product. Support cases are assigned to a Product Support Specialist based on the severity level of the issue, customer business impact and the order in which they are received. Partners successfully completing this learning path and assessment will be granted a digital badge for Verint Support Level 1.
648d84ee-78a6-4b0e-8fd5-d6042d8942d6.name: Verint Cloud Support - Level 1

badge_template_activities.title: Badge holder has completed the core curriculum for working with Verint Support. The curriculum consists of online classes and videos that allow the partner support professional to work their own pace, pause/resume and revisit topics.

ca68313f-3288-47eb-9590-ff860eb1a360.description: Verint® Desktop and Process Analytics™ is an innovative solution that gives organizations insight into processes and workflows that employees perform. The solution captures desktop events that signify key execution points in processes. This data can be used to track process workflows, work volumes, and process handle times. After completing the online curriculum the partner will have learned to install and configure Verint Desktop and Process Analytics.
ca68313f-3288-47eb-9590-ff860eb1a360.name: Verint Desktop and Process Analytics - Premise

badge_template_activities.title: Badge holder has completed the core curriculum for implementing Verint Desktop and Process Analytics in a premise environment.
